{title} You have {userData.length} accounts
{userData.map((user, index) => (
{user.isVerified ? (
{user.name.charAt(0)}
) : (
{user.name.charAt(0)} Available
)}
@{user.name} {user.accountType}
{listItems.map((item, idx) => ( {item} ))}
{index !== userData.length - 1 && }
